annotation.scene_description: The image shows a mixture of cooler and warmer areas. A notable elongated, warm signature appears near the bottom-left, possibly indicating a human or animal presence. Sparse higher intensity objects are visible among cooler regions.

anomalies.notable_features: Elongated, narrow thermal signature with strong contrast against cooler surroundings.
anomalies.anomaly_reasoning: Shape and thermal intensity suggest it could be a standing or crouched person or possibly an animal.
